title: PROJECT SKIN AND GIFTING QUESTIONS!!! PLEASE HELP
body:
ok ok ok ok. Before i buy it, I want to know if the new project skins have a border like the previous ones did. (fiora, yi leona) 

IF SO: I want to gift my husband an ashe skin with the border (if it has it) BUT. he is in the military on deployment, Whenever he gets home months from now and opens the skin, will it have the border?

replies.body:
nope.

This year the Boarders can get earned through Hextech Crafting:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting

> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting

Unlock the First Strike loading screen border for a new PROJECT skin by owning the skin as well as its corresponding First Strike icon by the end of the event (August 16 at 23:59:59 PDT).

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ

So you have to craft the First Strike Icons by combining 7 Project cores and 1 of the crafting materials.  The materials are in the bundles or in the packs that cost either rp or ip.

thanks so much for your help, I was able to figure out how to get the border for Ashe myself, but i have another question if youd be able to answer. 

Are the borders limited time? 

I gifted my husband Project ekko (hed like it better than ashe) and im just wondering if; whenever he comes home 2 months from now, would he be able to get the chests and blueprints and core elements to unlock the border.

Hey LynxPharoh - 

Taking a look at the [PROJECT: Disruption FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h2) - 

*"Unlock the First Strike loading screen border for a new PROJECT skin by owning the skin as well as its corresponding First Strike icon by the end of the event (August 16 at 23:59:59 PDT)."*

I also took a look at the [boards post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down) regarding PROJECT info, and dArtagnan stated - 

"*Even after the event ends, your content will not disappear! You can still unlock/craft Project content and receive the content, but not the special Loading Screen border. You just will not be able to buy any new caches. Project content can also be broken down into essence if you don't have enough to craft something.*"
Riot why do you have to make everything so complicated {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

This is a bit confusing so I'll try my best.
__
**Vocab:**__
Cashe - A Hextech chest that doesn't need a key to open
Augment Cashe - A cashe that will give a gurrenteed skin shard, a champion/skin shard and project cores.
Blueprint - A shard that required Project: Cores to fuse.
Project: Cores - Essence.

Alright, to unlock the First Strike border, you need to craft it's summoner icon. You can acquire the blueprint for the icon by purchasing the EM Caster Icon from the in-game store. Once you open the cashe in the Hextech Crafter, you will be given a permanent summoner icon, Project: Cores,  a blueprint for the First Strike icon and an augment cashe fragment. To aquire 7 Project: Cores, you must either purchase Augment Cashes with RP or buy the other Decrypter and Hyper Edge cashes, then craft an Augment Cashe. 

Once you craft the First Strike icon and you own it, you now have the border!

Sorry if this was confusing AF but I tried {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
